responses: That's great! In Bavaria, you can hike in forests or in mountains. Which do you prefer?[type forests/mountains]

You chose a great place, Zugspitze! It's the highest peak in Germany and offers breathtaking views. As a tour guide company - We provide a guided tours for our costumers.
Watzmann is a wonderful choice! It's the second highest mountain in Germany. As a tour guide company - We provide a guided tours for our costumers.

Neuschwanstein Castle is a wonderful choice! It's one of the most famous castles in the world. As a tour guide company - We provide a guided tours for our costumers.
Munich Residence is an amazing choice! It's the former royal palace of the Bavarian monarchs. As a tour guide company - We provide a guided tours for our costumers.
Romantic Road is an excellent choice! It's one of the best and most popular scenic drives in Germany. As a tour guide company - We provide a guided tours for our costumers.
